title: Shit Just Got Real (w/ Joe DeRosa, Sal Vulcano, John Popper & Dave Burd (Lil Dicky
description: Joe Derosa Co hosts The Bonfire as he and jay break down the weird things they’ve seen family members and friends eat. Sal Vulcano joins the show and asks who everyone would call if the apocalypse started right at this moment, jay chooses John Popper. John Popper Calls in to discuss living through the apocalypse with jay and brings up some very good points. From our interview with Lil Dicky, Dave discusses his penis size and being friends with girls in high school.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
